SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.DEL_YN , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.DEL_YN ='N' ORDER BY B.ID DESC

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.DEL_YN , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.DEL_YN ='N' ORDER BY B.ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , EMAIL , VIEW_CNT , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL , #{subject} /* 파라미터 (BoardVO)의 getSubject()의 결과*/ , #{content} /* 파라미터 (BoardVO)의 getContent()의 결과*/ , #{email} /* 파라미터 (BoardVO)의 getEmail()의 결과*/ , 0 , SYSDATE , NULL , #{fileName} /* 파라미터 (BoardVO)의 getFileName()의 결과*/ , #{originFileName} /* 파라미터 (BoardVO)의 getOriginFileName()의 결과*/ , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.DEL_YN , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.DEL_YN ='N' AND ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE BOARD SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MDFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{_parameter}
